attributes.action: conceptually overhaul the classification of controlled substances as defined under the Misuse of Drugs Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system of drug classification is overly simplistic, insufficiently politically isolated, and misleading to the public.
A better alternative would involve independently scoring various aspects of a given substance, such as types and strengths of substance, effect, addictiveness and health dangers, and tailoring legislation to concentrate on the most harmful of these.
